title: The Lonely Wizard
caption: 2D Unity Game
description: After taking an Intro to C++ programming course at UNLV, I decided to transfer my knowledge to C# for designing a 2D rogue-like shooter game over winter break. Through this project, I learned key game development concepts like the gameplay loop, animation triggers, player controls, and inheritance.
I also gained experience in integrating player stats and enemy AI behaviors. The project helped me sharpen my problem-solving skills, particularly when addressing animation-related physics issues.
seoDescription: The Lonely Wizard is a 2D top-down rogue-like shooter game created with C# and Unity. It features engaging game mechanics, enemy AI, and a leveling system for a dynamic gameplay experience.
